channel.title: Change ground completley?
channel.description: Is it possible to change the ground color? As in change it from grass to sand? Question Two: Where are all the object ids that i see in game. Exampe: In the varrock general store there are shelves, where is the code that puts the shelves there? Does my client download it directlly from the runescape webclient?

item.title: Change ground completley?
item.dc:creator: @Aero_Mist Aero Mist
item.description:
@Aero_Mist wrote:

I know how to add items! I was just wondering where i could find all the code for all the non-added by me items in the game (And yes, i know what i was trying to do was rather useless for a newb like me but it could be useful for future refrence).

So could anyone explain what client side scripting is? Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Change ground completley?

@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

addobject look in your client.java first 2 #s the coords and 3rd ID 4 i think which way it faces

item.title: Change ground completley?
item.dc:creator: @LEL LEL
item.description:
@LEL wrote:

Aero Mist:

When i said the ID’s for all the objects i didn’t mean it that way. I mean where is the code that puts them there? obviouslly its not in any of the .java files cause the code to put all of the items into the game would be like a lot of lines… and could you please explain what client coding or w/e is and how i can do it? Thanks

No. That is all already there because we are using a 317 cache server which is already there. To add you own just get the add object method.

Read full topic

RESPONSE to lostandfound: So basiclly i can find all the obj code in the Program files > moparscape, folder? Or is it more complicated then that?
